rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C181166

self.title: CDISC SEND Test Site Activity Response Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the general type of study activity performed at a test site.
name: Test Site Activity Response
preferredTerm: CDISC SEND Test Site Activity Response Terminology

terms.definition: Testing activities to measure the amount of biotics and/or xenobiotics for the purpose of characterizing absorption, distribution, metabolism, and excretion (ADME) properties.
All testing activities involving clinical pathology within the study.
Testing activities involving clinical pathology for certain endpoints within the study.
Data analysis activities to interpret electrocardiograms.
An assessment of macroscopic pathological findings.
Microscopic evaluation of tissues for detection of abnormalities.

Data analysis that results in the characterization of the in vivo exposure to a substance/analyte, which may be used to characterize one or more ADME (absorption, distribution, metabolism, and excretion) properties.
